Assets.DESCRIPTION[FreedomSubwayStationB: Create a station module to add, platforms with different depths for subway, trains and trams and create entrances for pedestrians to have access. With the new update it now acts as an invisible entrance. Place it on a roadside that you will be able to click later.
Assets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION[FreedomSubway: A small subway entrance.
A large station entrance.
The default vanilla station entrance.
A medium station entrance.
A commercial model entrance for the station.
An entrance that uses the bronze statue in the game. Pedestrians can access at all sides.
An entrance that needs to be placed on the sidewalk of a road. Pedestrians that are walking on the sidewalk will have access to the station. Your road needs to have a sidewalk.
A small roadside entrance to be placed on the side of a road or sidewalk.
An invisible entrance that can be added for pedestrian to have access to the station. Place it inside a building or on a hidden place that pedestrian have access.
The subway track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -20 of depth.
The subway track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -30 of depth.
The subway track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -40 of depth.
The subway track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -50 of depth.
Assets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION[FreedomTrainS: The train track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -20 of depth.
The train track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -30 of depth.
The train track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -40 of depth.
The train track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -50 of depth.
Assets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION[FreedomTramSt: The tram track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -20 of depth.
The tram track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -30 of depth.
The tram track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -40 of depth.
The tram track installation upgrade for the Module Station with -50 of depth.
Assets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION[FreedomSubway: The subway track installation upgrade for the Station Module with -20 of depth and a curved 90 degree angle.
The subway track installation upgrade for the Station Module with -30 of depth and a curved 90 degree angle.
The subway track installation upgrade for the Station Module with -40 of depth and a curved 90 degree angle.
The subway track installation upgrade for the Station Module with -50 of depth and a curved 90 degree angle.
Assets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION[FreedomBusSta: A bus station for public transportation. Also serves as an entrance to the module and underground platforms.
A bus station for public transportation. Also serves as an entrance to the module and underground platforms.
Assets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION[FreedomSubway: A subway station for underground transportation. Also serves as an entrance to the module and underground platforms.
An elevated subway station for above-ground transportation. Also serves as an entrance to the module and underground platforms.
An elevated subway station for above-ground transportation. Also serves as an entrance to the module and underground platforms.
